headline: Why Franklin Resources (BEN) is a Great Dividend Stock Right Now
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does Franklin Resources (BEN) have what it takes? Let's find out.

raw.headline: Why Franklin Resources (BEN) is a Great Dividend Stock Right Now
raw.summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does Franklin Resources (BEN) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: Is Franklin Templeton’s Blockchain Push Quietly Reframing BEN’s Core Growth Story?
summary: Franklin Templeton recently updated two Western Asset institutional money market funds to support tokenized-finance use cases and launched a blockchain-enabled digital institutional share class, while its Canadian arm added the Franklin Global Core Equity Fund to its low-cost core equity suite. Together, these moves highlight Franklin Resources’ push to integrate blockchain into regulated products and broaden factor-based global equity offerings for institutional and retail clients. Next,...
